typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'CustomerData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> CustomerDataDeltaSource
source(output(
		CountryId as integer,
		IsoCountryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Country',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TargetCountry
source(output(
		LocationId as integer,
		LocationCity as string,
		LocationState as string,
		CountryId as integer,
		LocationZip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Location',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TargetLocation
CustomerDataDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(CustomerKey),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Customer = last(Customer),
		CustomerId = last(CustomerId)) ~> Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource
Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		PostalCode,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		Customer,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerData
CustomerData select(mapColumn(
		CountryRegionAlias = CountryRegion,
		PostalCode,
		StateProvince,
		City
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCustomerData
TargetCountry aggregate(groupBy(CountryId),
	IsoCountryName = last(IsoCountryName)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetCountry
Deduplicated1TargetCountry select(mapColumn(
		CountryId,
		IsoCountryNameAlias = IsoCountryName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCountry
SelectCustomerData, SelectCountry join(CountryRegionAlias === IsoCountryNameAlias,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForCountryId
JoinForCountryId select(mapColumn(
		CountryRegionAlias,
		PostalCode,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		CountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectForCountryId
SelectForCountryId select(mapColumn(
		LocationZip = PostalCode,
		LocationState = StateProvince,
		LocationCity = City,
		CountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PreSKSelectLocation
PreSKSelectLocation aggregate(groupBy(LocationCity,
		LocationState,
		CountryId,
		LocationZip),
	Count = count(1)) ~> Deduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation
Deduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation select(mapColumn(
		LocationCity,
		LocationState,
		CountryId,
		LocationZip
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation
TargetLocation aggregate(groupBy(LocationId),
	LocationZip = last(LocationZip),
		LocationState = last(LocationState),
		LocationCity = last(LocationCity),
		CountryId = last(CountryId)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetLocation
Deduplicated1TargetLocation select(mapColumn(
		LocationCity,
		LocationState,
		CountryId,
		LocationZip,
		LocationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation
SelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation select(mapColumn(
		TarLocationCity = LocationCity,
		TarLocationState = LocationState,
		TarCountryId = CountryId,
		TarLocationZip = LocationZip,
		TarLocationId = LocationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation
SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation, SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation join(LocationCity === TarLocationCity
	&& LocationState === TarLocationState
	&& CountryId === TarCountryId
	&& LocationZip === TarLocationZip,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation filter(isNull(TarLocationId)) ~> FilterInsertLocation
FilterInsertLocation select(mapColumn(
		LocationCity,
		LocationState,
		CountryId,
		LocationZip
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> InsertLocation
InsertLocation keyGenerate(output(Sk_LocationId as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> SkLocation
SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation aggregate(Max_TarLocationId = max(toInteger(TarLocationId)) + 0) ~> AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation
AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation derive(Max_TarLocationId = iif(isNull(Max_TarLocationId),0,Max_TarLocationId)) ~> MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation
SkLocation, MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation join(true() === true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation
JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation derive(LocationId = Sk_LocationId + Max_TarLocationId) ~> DerivedLocation
DerivedLocation select(mapColumn(
		LocationCity,
		LocationState,
		CountryId,
		LocationZip,
		LocationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PostSkLocation
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetLocation filter(!isNull(TarLocationId)) ~> FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation
FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation select(mapColumn(
		LocationCity,
		LocationState,
		CountryId,
		LocationZip,
		LocationId = TarLocationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation
PostSkLocation, UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation union(byName: true)~> UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation
UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation select(mapColumn(
		TarLocationCity = LocationCity,
		TarLocationState = LocationState,
		TarCountryId = CountryId,
		TarLocationZip = LocationZip,
		TarLocationId = LocationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation
PreSKSelectLocation, SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation join(LocationCity === TarLocationCity
	&& LocationState === TarLocationState
	&& CountryId === TarCountryId
	&& LocationZip === TarLocationZip,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation
JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectLocation select(mapColumn(
		LocationZip,
		LocationState,
		LocationCity,
		CountryId,
		LocationId = TarLocationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FinalLocation
FinalLocation aggregate(groupBy(LocationId),
	LocationZip = last(LocationZip),
		LocationState = last(LocationState),
		LocationCity = last(LocationCity),
		CountryId = last(CountryId)) ~> Location
Location sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Location',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> LocationSink
